melee.name: Swung Too Hard
melee.effect: Without the resistance of a successful strike, you lose hold of your weapon. Spend 5 Stamina to either recover it or draw a different weapon.

melee.name: Slipped
melee.effect: You step on something slippery. Test DEX or be Knocked Down.

melee.name: Moved Wrong
melee.effect: You overdo it and pull a muscle. Test CON or reduce your Stamina by 3 for this encounter.

melee.name: Lost Confidence
melee.effect: Now that you think about it, this is not looking good. Reduce your Initiative by 2.

melee.name: Panic Attack
melee.effect: Test WIL or reduce your Combat skills by 2 for this encounter.

melee.name: Twisted Ankle
melee.effect: You step the wrong way and now it hurts each time you move. Add +2 to all incoming damage.

melee.name: Exposed
melee.effect: You swing ungraciously and leave yourself exposed. All enemies targeting you get a free attack.

melee.name: Unguarded
melee.effect: You are fighting recklessly. You cannot spend Stamina on defensive maneuvers for the rest of this encounter.

melee.name: Exhausted
melee.effect: The fight’s weight suddenly overwhelms you. Roll Recovery Checks with disadvantage for this encounter.

melee.name: Terrible Swing
melee.effect: You miscalculate badly, not only missing your target but hitting yourself. Roll for damage as normal.

ranged.name: Jammed Weapon
ranged.effect: It won’t fix itself! Either spend all your Stamina unjamming it or spend 5 Stamina to drop it and draw a different weapon.

ranged.name: Slipped
ranged.effect: You step on something slippery. Test DEX or be Knocked Down.

ranged.name: Dropped Weapon
ranged.effect: Your weapon slips from your sweaty hands. Spend 5 Stamina to either recover it or draw a different weapon.

ranged.name: Loss of Confidence
ranged.effect: Now that you think about it, this is not looking good. Reduce your Initiative by 2.

ranged.name: Panic Attack
ranged.effect: Test WIL or reduce your Combat skills by 2 for this encounter.

ranged.name: Shattered
ranged.effect: Instead of firing, your weapon blows up in your hands. You are unscathed but your weapon is scrap.

ranged.name: Exposed
ranged.effect: You step to the wrong side, leaving yourself exposed. All enemies targeting you get a free attack.

ranged.name: Unguarded
ranged.effect: You are fighting recklessly. You cannot spend Stamina on defensive maneuvers for the rest of this encounter.
